channel.title: NPC Reset!
channel.description:
Is there are sort of NPC Reset feature?
like for instance if a boss kills a player, it will respawn with full health
Because at the moment players are able to 1 item bosses by simply going straight back to the boss after they die and it will have same hp.. and after a few runs they eventually kill it.. not exactly "fair play"
All I need is a direction to a file, or where abouts in a file and I can get on and figure out the rest.. I have done some checks around NPChandler but havent found anything of Use.
**Note** If it helps, at the moment Jad resets after killing player. So Id like to find out what it is in the code, causing him to "reset".
Thanks in advance
-Hawk

item.title: NPC Reset!
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

I was unaware of that. But its off-topic. I am not asking what other things you can do it on

I was asking if it were possible or as to where I might look into doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Reset!
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

you can do the same thing on runescape L
